comment: Easy class! Tests come mostly from powerpoints.  She is very clear and wants to help you understand.  Small lab and class quizzes but they are easy.  Will count off final grade if miss more than three classes/one lab.  Fair grader.  Little textbook use. Responds to emails. Labs are easy.   Overall, she is a good professor! Highly recommend!

Awesome Professor she uses PowerPoint for her lesson plan and gives you extra for every test... Very reasonable and lets you turn late assignments. I loved her teaching speed and methods she used to help us understand the material
